titleStmt.title: A rare example of a vertuous maid in Paris, who was by her own mother procured to be put in prison, thinknig [sic] thereby to compel her to popery, but she continued to the end, and finished her life in the fire. Tune is, O man in desperation.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clark.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
